text: Campigneulles-les-Grandes is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France. ==Geography== A village situated some 3 miles (5 km) southwest of Montreuil-sur-Mer on the D917 road. ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Campigneulleslesgrandes
title: Campigneulles-les-Grandes
